description: It took a little bit of work to get this video up, but god was it worth it! This stepdaddy has been amping up the security in his house ever since his new wife and stepson moved in. It started as a few motion-sensitive lights and cameras, but it quickly escalated when he saw the boy’s overtly flirtatious behavior. His stepson kept putting on little shows for the cameras, flashing his cock and butt, knowing that his new stepdad would see it. And when you take a look at him, there’s no question why he would! He’s is a tall man with a great body and perfect set of nuts. This video shows one of the times that his stepson was caught on camera teasing his stepfather. And sure enough, his old man takes the bait! After fighting off his attraction to the boy for months, he finally gives in. He storms into the kitchen to scold the boy, but seeing his naked kid in the flesh is more than he can resist. Soon the pretty boy is on his knees with a big dick in his mouth, and he leaves the kitchen with a hot load of family seed on his butt.
title: Home Security
